title: [Suggestion] - New Graves Skin !
body:
Hello Summoners ,

as you already know , there is Polish skin in the game , the name of the skin is Winged Hussar  . And as far as i know , the skin was given to all polish players. I'm Bulgarian and i suggest one skin for GRAVES . Skin Name : Guardian or Guard Graves .So here are a couple of pictures from Bulgarian Guards : 1st - http://i.imgur.com/Y29yGoU.jpg 2nd-  http://i.imgur.com/SD8eqWI.jpg . I think this skin will be looking good on Graves. The Animations : CTRL + 2 says : I serve to the Republic. CTRL + 1 : Will be marching on place.

So thats it from me , i hope you like it :)
Best Wishes :)
